channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Miracle In Bethlehem, PA
channel.desc: After adopting a baby just before Christmas, Mary gets stuck in Bethlehem, Pennsylvania. There's no room at the inn, so they have to stay with the innkeeper's brother, Joe.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Following Yonder Star
channel.desc: Abby Marshall, once celebrated for her role as an inspirational mother on TV, spends a chaotic Christmas at a remote Vermont retreat. Can her own holiday wishes come true.
